name: devopera-docsf
author: (c) Alex Stanhope, Devopera.com
summary: ConfigServer Firewall and Login Failure Daemon installation and configuration module
description:
ConfigServer Firewall (csf) and Login Failure Daemon (lfd)
are designed to protect online servers by providing an adaptive firewall and access/process monitoring service.
CSF in turn uses IPtables to actually implement the firewall rules.  This module also includes Linux Malware Detect
(maldet) for detecting malware.
